features.featureTitle: In the Press Kit screenshots gallery (frontend/src/pages/PressKitPage.tsx), add a 1-pixel solid black border to every screenshot image in the responsive grid. The border must also apply to the image displayed inside the fullscreen overlay. In dark mode, the border should be 1px solid white (to remain visible against the dark background). The border must be applied directly to the elements via Tailwind classes or inline styles.

Rewrite frontend/src/components/Header.tsx from scratch to definitively fix the Internet Identity login button. The component must: (1) import useInternetIdentity from its canonical path 'frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity'; (2) read isAuthenticated (or equivalent identity/principal state) from the hook synchronously at render time — do not gate the button on any async loading flag that delays its appearance; (3) render a 'Sign In' button in the top-right corner (alongside the dark/light theme toggle) whenever isAuthenticated is false; (4) call the hook's login() function on button click to trigger the Internet Identity authentication popup; (5) hide the 'Sign In' button completely once isAuthenticated is true; (6) style the button in the monochrome editorial style — ghost or outlined, black/white/grayscale only, no color accents. The button must be visible on first page load when the user is not logged in, with no delay or flicker caused by initialization guards.
